Why WiredTree?

» ServerShield Server Hardeninghttp://www.wiredtree.com/managedservers/serverhardening.php
All WiredTree VPS servers include our exclusive initial security hardening service, ServerShield, free of charge. This service saves you time and money by greatly increasing the security, performance, and reliability of your WiredTree server. It includes APF firewall, anti-spam and anti-virus configuration, Brute Force Detection, HTTP intrusion protection, and more! Your server is locked down, ready to go when you receive it! It also includes FFMPEG, Mencoder and all needed utilities to run video streaming/sharing sites, Ruby/Rails, and much more.

» Complete Managementhttp://www.wiredtree.com/supportservices/
Our plans feature complete management - software + hardware + network + proactive monitoring. Quite simply, we take care of your server so that you can run your business. Our support is perfect for who wish to outsource server administration, those upgrading from shared hosting or reseller accounts to a dedicated, and for anyone who needs business-class hosting.

We provide you full 24/7/365 toll-free phone and help desk support for all software that comes installed on your managed server. All support is provided directly from US based Level 3 technicians with years of system administration experience. Each server comes with 24/7/365 monitoring as well as proactive response to any downed services - you can sleep soundly again! Your server is kept up to date with all of the latest security patches. We provide full support for the hardware in your server, backed by one of the industry's best SLAs.

» Average ticket response time is well under 15 minutes!

» Free Transfer Assistance: Need help moving from your old provider? Just ask! We can help, free of charge! We provide complete migrations from the following control panels: Alabanza, DirectAdmin, CI Host, Ensim / Parallels Pro, Cobalt RaQ, H-Sphere (Linux Only), Plesk (all versions), Web Panel, Zervex, DSM/ServerCP!

» True Server-Grade Hardwarehttp://www.wiredtree.com/managedservers/
All of our servers also feature the latest in true server-grade hardware. Our VPS servers feature quad-core Intel Xeon Harpertown processors, Registerd ECC Memory, Hot Swap 8 disk RAID-10 RE3 arrays, and SuperMicro motherboards and chassis.

» WiredTree is not a reseller - we own all of our equipment and operate our own network!
We operate private datacenter space in downtown Chicago, Illinois, United States and own all of our network equipment and server hardware! Our network is powered by 5 Tier 1 providers: Level(3), Sprint, Savvis, NTT and Cogent. We use the latest in Juniper Routers and Cisco Switches. For more information, please visit our network and datacenter sections.

WiredTree SLA: www.wiredtree.com/legal/sla.html

IP to ping and Speed Test: http://speedtest.wiredtree.com - 208.86.154.126

If you have any questions about our services, please contact me at zac@wiredtree.com or give us a call - 866-523-8733 / +1 312-447-0510 International. You can also PM me!
